content: I consider myself an advanced metrics guy but when it comes to this particular MVP award we have to go back to the basics. Russ has done something that we all believed would never happen again. Averaging a triple double in a season isn’t even possible on video games and I feel like people are overthinking the easiest MVP decision in history. Records matter and this is a historically great season that can’t be overlooked. Harden was great but denying Russ the MVP is disrespectful to NBA history.
